1. Run command '...'
2. With configuration '...'
3. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- OS: [e.g. Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 22.04]

- CUDA version (if applicable): [e.g. 11.6]

Paste the complete error message here
